DOC.brief_summary: The drug GSK189075 GW869682 result increase caloric loss . This study investigate take 8 week affect weight loss , food intake composition body . The body composition ( fat , water , lean mass ) determine use new investigational MR technology .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Of Weight Loss And Body Composition Changes After Dosing With Either Placebo Or One Of Two Active Drugs
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : BMI 30 40kg/m Females may include surgically sterile postmenopausal Exclusion criterion : Change body weight > 4 % last 3 month History eat disorder bariatric surgical intervention obesity type I II diabetes Thyroid disorder control Renal hepatobiliary disease Excessive alcohol consumption Use drug abuse donate blood last 3 month
